MacGuyver character is humble, a geek and a nerd. MacGuyver also has a kind/compassionate and sweet and funny personality. At times, MacGuyver is naive, which seems to also allow him creativity. And he was brave when required. Whoever the woman is, she needs to embody these characteristics, with a female perspective, who is open and intuitive and willing to be female and not a male impersonator. Having just seen Mila Kunis in JUPITER ASCENDING, washing out toilets, scene after scene, with a wry sense of humor, someone who, like her, can pull that off believably has my vote.
